aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: For Catena-X business case Quality Management. Supported technical features: delta update feature, meta information feature and can be used along the supply chain - also for supplier-to-supplier data exchange. The supported model features are described in detail in the Catena-X Quality KIT. This model is used to exchange quality tasks. A quality task is used to link information from different Catena-X Quality Management data models together.
Property for the list of quality tasks.
Property for the list of quality tasks.
A list of companies involved in this quality task
A list of companies involved in this quality task

aas:langStringNameType.aas:text: Business Partner Number Legal Entity Property

This meta information is valid for all entries in this data set. The meta information is used to tell the data consumer which selection criteria were applied by the data provider.

For Catena-X business case Quality Management. Supported technical features: delta update feature, meta information feature and can be used along the supply chain - also for supplier-to-supplier data exchange. The supported model features are described in detail in the Catena-X Quality KIT. This model is used to exchange quality tasks. A quality task is used to link information from different Catena-X Quality Management data models together.

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: For Catena-X business case Quality Management. Supported technical features: delta update feature, meta information feature and can be used along the supply chain - also for supplier-to-supplier data exchange. The supported model features are described in detail in the Catena-X Quality KIT. This model is used to exchange quality tasks. A quality task is used to link information from different Catena-X Quality Management data models together.
A unique quality task identifier within this data-space.
Timestamp when this quality task was created in ISO8601 local date notation.
What should be done with the data after this quality task is closed
Description what should be done in this quality task
The name of a part. A part name is not unique - same kinds of parts can have the same part name.
Status of this quality task
Working title for this quality task
Name of the company

aas:langStringNameType.aas:text: Business Partner Number Legal Entity Property

aas:langStringPreferredNameTypeIec61360.aas:text: Business Partner Number Legal Entity Property

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: Property based on a BPNL.
An email address.
A list of companies involved in this quality task

The record operation enumeration can be used to realize delta update concept. An example using scenario that data delivery runs weekly: Week0: All data is transferred -> all rows have recordStatus=new. Week1: Only the changed data is transferred: That means new rows, or updated or deleted rows: New rows get recordStatus=new, changed rows get recordStatus=changed and deleted/removed rows get recordStatus=deleted.
Key identifier for this additional information
Value for this additional information
You can use this key:value list for additional properties that were not defined in this aspect model.
Property for the list of quality tasks.
Describes the selection criteria a Catena-X data provider has applied to create this data set.
Describes the starting point for providing records in this data set.
Describes the end point for providing records in this data set.
This meta information is valid for all entries in this data set. The meta information is used to tell the data consumer which selection criteria were applied by the data provider.
